gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GUI

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • go

        public void go()
        This method runs all the methods and displays the GUI

      • buildTop

        private void buildTop()
        This method builds the top panel which specifies the paths for the ham, spam and rules' files

      • buildMiddle

        private void buildMiddle()
        This method builds the middle panel which contains three buttons(generate and save).

      • evaluateConfig

        protected void evaluateConfig(java.lang.Object[][] data)
        The evaluateConfig method determines the false negatives and false positives. The former increments counterFP and the latter increments counterFN.

      • readRules

        private void readRules()
        The method readRules reads the file rules.cf and adds all its contents to an arraylist. Then iterates the arraylist and writes to the matrix (dataMatrixManual, dataMatrixAutomatic) the rule and its respective weight.

      • buildBottom

        private void buildBottom()
        This method builds the bottom panel which contains makeConfigButton and saveConfigButton

                      throws java.io.IOException
